Html:
Is the Composite.TestSupport project missing from the Desktop RI implementation? I just ran the .bat and it came up with Composite.TestSupport referenced assembly not found. Added it and after that no problem.

Richard

Hi Richard,

We’ve reproduced the issue and found that the project is missing in the solution.

We have notified this to the Prism team. Thank you for reporting this.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
